storyInfo: Laios's party, thinking they're being attacked. The pioneers, thinking they're getting robbed by the Laios's party. A Rhodes Island operator, just here on a mission. Thanks to a flock of out-of-control drones, these three parties are thrown into a chaotic situation.

attributes.content: What's going on?! Why are we being chased by all these magic items?! Who sent them after us?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: My sword can't reach them! They're not like the other monsters we've fought before!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille! Use your magic already!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I... I got caught in the blast!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*! They can use both explosion and freezing magic, and target them with precision. These things sure are something!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: They're too quick, I can't aim like this!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What do we do then?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: We run! I'll use my magic to counter theirs! Try to get out of their range!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Looks like there's a village that way! These things flew in over from there though, so I don't think we're going to see any friendly faces...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Marcille! Look out!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I figured out their flight patterns!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Leave us... alone already!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The bombs are sent flying by Marcille's magic, heading right back to the drones that fired them.
Hoist by their own petard, they rattle and shake as they fall to the ground.

With a massive boom, the buildings are set ablaze, and the ringing of the blast is closely followed by the shouting of the villagers. After the explosion comes the falling magic items, which careen into a few unlucky souls.
Marcille can't help but tighten her grip on her staff.
I think we made them really mad, Laios!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Senshi, Marcille, sometimes we just have to grit our teeth and get fighting.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: A shame... we still haven't found out anything about Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: By golly, the Catastrophe didn't ruin none of our corn fields! Didn't get licked by the sandstorm neither!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: I've been worried sick for days over this. If the fields're gone, we'd have nothing to eat or sell past summertime!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: How bout's I go start up the drones then, boss? Other places mightn't have been as lucky. If they see we're still spick and span, we're gonna have a problem with thieves and looters.
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Well go on then. Just 'member to switch them from patrol mode to attack mode.
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Oh right, remember to let that Rhodes Island fella in, he's meant to be stopping by after the Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: You got it, boss!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Eh? That ain't right... Why's the drone relay all...
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: The drones ain't responding? Signal's... Boss! Boss!!!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Th-The Catastrophe hit the drone relay! The drones— They're outta control!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Alright, don't lose your cool! Turn that relay off first!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: I can't! It ain't shutting down!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Gosh dang diddly darn it! Figure it out yourself! I'm not paying you to sit around and do nothing!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Ah! The, the... Originium circuits... The mainline board...
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Hey, what's going on here?! Not gonna welcome me in?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Field Operator

attributes.content: No, no, you're a sight for sore eyes! I remember you, you're Ryan, the guy with the little hammer! Come help us out, the drones are outta control!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: That so? Alright, hang back a bit. I'll go take a look for you—
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Wha— Who was that?! Is someone really here to take our crops?!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Screw those bastards!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Hey, this is Ryan, with a new entry for the mission log.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: First, bringing back Ceobe. Uh... This mission's proving a bit harder than anticipated. Our intel says this is the last place the kid showed up, but actually finding her's not so simple.
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Then I've got to pay a visit to the 'Cornhole', see how they're doing after the Catastrophe. Hope everything's alright there—
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: What was that?! Is there a dust-up going on in the frontier?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Ah! The, the... Originium circuits... The mainline board...
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: (...I don't see anyone from outside the village? Seems like they've got some kind of internal issues.)
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: (Guess I better find out what's going on. These guys aren't the friendliest bunch...)
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hey, what's going on here?! Not gonna welcome me in?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: No, no, you're a sight for sore eyes! I remember you, you're Ryan, the guy with the little hammer! Come help us out, the drones are outta control!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: (Phew, okay, just some out-of-control drones. If there really was fighting out here, I'd be done for...)
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: That so? Alright, hang back a bit. I'll go take a look for you—
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: *hack* *cough* *cough* *cough*!!!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: (Dammit, there really are other pioneers here to pick a fight!)
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Wha— Who was that?! Is someone really here to take our crops?!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Screw those bastards!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: (This can't be good. if I get Rhodes Island involved in a frontier tussle, we'll be in trouble. L-Let's get these guys to safety first, and hopefully that'll calm things down—)
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Hey, don't be rash, buddy! You don't know how many people are out there, we best hunker down for now!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Frick that, I saw four of 'em earlier! Go for the two shorties first!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: Let's gettem!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Hey, wai—
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: ...Eh? Only four of them? What kind of gang is this?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Two groups? Be careful, they've got weapons, and more of those magic items Marcille can't do anything about. Just stay calm.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: CALM?! I AM DONE BEING CALM! My hair's all messed up thanks to that explosion! Ruined my braid! I really liked it, you know?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You ess-oh-bees think you can mess with me? You sick freaks think you can just bomb my barn?!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: No, stop! Let's talk it out like civilized folk! The drones are still flying around like crazy! Do you really want to pick a fight now?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Shove it! You think I'm scared of my own drones?
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: What good is talking going to do when it's them who attacked us out of nowhere?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Shut it, lady, you're the ones who blew up my barn! You guys got a death wish—
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: They're attacking! Take cover!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Well, yeah, they're the ones controlling the magic items!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Gah! Yowch! None of these pains-in-the-butt are listening to me— Ow!
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: Look, fighting out in the wild's just going to draw in who-knows-what! Let's all calm down and talk things out, okay?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: As though in response to his earnest plea, all of a sudden, the ground begins to rumble.
Could it be another Catastrophe? The thought flits through the minds of some, but is immediately dispelled by what comes next.
A tidal wave of gloompincers seems to have had enough of the drones dropping bombs in the skies above their heads. They raise their pincers in formation and march towards the gaggle of people...
A swarm of monsters?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Run! We can't handle that many with just the four of us!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: But there's nowhere to run! We're surrounded!
attributes.name: Chilchuck
Chilchuck
attributes.content: Let's just back off for now...

attributes.name: Chilchuck
attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.joined: Let's just back off for now... Ugh!

attributes.content: —Gah! Watch where you're going! Who was that?! I'll hammer you into—It's you punks?!
attributes.name: Pioneer A

attributes.content: We can't run, boss! The gloompincers got us hemmed in!
attributes.name: Pioneer B

attributes.content: Everyone, please, listen to me. We'll deal with them together, alright?
attributes.name: Ryan

attributes.content: A-And don't forget the drones!
attributes.name: Ryan
